autofocus.description: Specifies that the drop-down list should automatically get focus when the page loads

disabled.description: Specifies that the drop-down list should be disabled

multiple.description: Specifies that multiple items can be selected at once

name.description: Defines a name for the drop-down list

size.description: Defines the number of visible options in the drop-down list

title.value: The HTML select element represents a control for selecting amongst a set of options, usually presented as a menu of choices.
